title: Young and Willing (1943 Comedy) Directed by Edward H. Griffith | with William Holden, Susan Hayward

sources.title: Young and Willing (1943 Comedy) Directed by Edward H. Griffith | with William Holden, Susan Hayward
sources.description:
A troupe of struggling aspiring actors—including Norman (William Holden), Marge (Barbara Britton), and Tony (James Brown), Kate (Susan Hayward), Dottie (Martha O’Driscoll), George (Eddie Bracken) —share a Greenwich Village apartment, enforcing a strict “no romance” rule... until Marge and Tony’s secret marriage and a surprise visit from Dottie's judgmental father upend their plans. Chaos erupts when clueless George barges in mid-shower, sparking a madcap scramble to disguise their co-ed living situation, while producer Arthur Kenny (Robert Benchley) gets tangled in the farce. Lies spiral, doors slam, and the gang’s Broadway dreams hinge on improvising their way through parental interrogations and mistaken identities.


Original title: Young and Willing 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/QdQ1mXGcuac


Director: Edward H. Griffith
Writers: Virginia Van Upp, Francis Swann
Stars: William Holden, Eddie Bracken, Robert Benchley, Susan Hayward, Barbara Britton 
Costumes: Edith Head
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Literary, Romance
Release date: February 5, 1943
Filming location: Hollywood
